original_text: The Pharisees and the teachers of the law were looking for a reason to accuse Jesus, so they watched him closely to see if he would heal on the Sabbath.
korean_text: 서기관과 바리새인들이 예수를 고발할 증거를 찾으려 하여 안식일에 병을 고치시는가 엿보니

sentences.original_text: The Pharisees and teachers of the law
were looking for a reason to accuse Jesus

sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 그를 주의 깊게 지켜보았다

sentences.original_text: to see if he would heal on the Sabbath
sentences.korean_translation: 안식일에 그가 병을 고치는지 보기 위해
